list.abs: "unflagging"怎么说合适-翻译"unflagging"... ... unflagging effort 不懈努力; unfading unflagging 不衰的.
Where not a frost has been; 寒霜未侵In its unfading flowers 不凋的繁花丛里I hear the bright bee hum; 我听见蜜蜂轻快的嘤嘤
This advanced dyeing technology can make the products unfading ., 这种先进的印染技术 , 使产品永不褪色.
什么意思... ... The Secret of Unfading Love 相爱不渝的秘诀 unfading glory 不朽的荣誉 unfading unflagging 不衰的.

auth_sentence.content: It was a masterstroke to cast Riva, whose sweetness of face and manner is as unfaded as that of any actress alive.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was a masterstroke to cast Riva, whose sweetness of face and manner is as unfaded as that of any actress alive.
